text:
It would appear tomcat doesn't run under RH7.2. The server segfaults out after 
a few seconds. The most recent version of Sun's JDK is installed, and all 
environment variables initialised. Kernel is standard 2.4.7. The machine this 
was tested on doesn't run the Apache web server. Hope you guys can fix this!

Output from crash is below:

Using CLASSPATH:     /home/fyre/jakarta-tomcat-
4.0.1/bin/bootstrap.jar:/usr/java/jdk1.3.1_01/lib/tools.jar
Using CATALINA_BASE: /home/fyre/jakarta-tomcat-4.0.1
Using CATALINA_HOME: /home/fyre/jakarta-tomcat-4.0.1
Using JAVA_HOME:     /usr/java/jdk1.3.1_01
./catalina.sh: line 234:  2477 Segmentation fault      $JAVA_HOME/bin/java 
$CATALINA_OPTS -classpath $CP -Dcatalina.base=$CATALINA_BASE -
Dcatalina.home=$CATALINA_HOME org.apache.catalina.startup.Bootstrap "$@" start
creator: scott@javascript-games.org

text:
Oh, by the way - tomcat version 3.3 was/is running on the same machine with no 
problems.
creator: scott@javascript-games.org

text:
It's a well-known issue with JDK 1.2 and 1.3 under Linux. Please see the 
release notes for the workarounds.
creator: remm@apache.org
